name: Space Ninja (Punit Dabas)
description:
Team GH-75

Punit Dabas

Akshay Kumar

Ankur Singh Pal

Mihir Singh

Action-adventure runner space game.Power up coin will double the speed for 10 sec and 100 percent health.Score depend on time and kills.

Use your fighting skills to survive the harshness of space. Some enemies can be killed only with combination of projectile and melee atack.
